title: My Google pixle 3 adroid is fully updated and i have 24 gb free storage still it freezes and wont respond after 5 to 10 mins of continues use rstarting the phone doesn't help either sometimes i can't even close some apps
content: Any single game that I try to play freezes my phone or close by itself. I play guns of boom clash royal and pubg. My phone won't respond after 5 to 10 mins of continues use
